showerReviews.reviewText: … The staff is so disgusting here, its my 3rd time here to get the shower, all the time there were 7-8 people working but nobody wants to clean the shower and it takes 30-40 minutes everytime , and finally have to come back without taking …

Super clean, nice staff, bar soap and wash cloths in shower like a hotel.
Mason at the subway was awesome and helpful.  10 out of 10 would come again!!

The exterior seemed clean and there were plenty of open parking spaces. We utilized the showers and it was terrific. The water stayed hot forever and the water pressure was fantastic. If only my shower and home was this good! The woman on …

As a driver the only thing I look forward to after a run is a nice hot shower.  Well the water was hot i give you that, however the black hair that was all over the shower and the amount of black and yellow mold in the shower was disgusting …

… finally after finding a not so legal spot to park ....  I bought a shower so I can finally relax After a long day.......didn't actually had one available after 2 and half hours!   Man. Took a lot of my reset time to "REST".  Worst …

Awful.  Freezing cold shower.  Went to get something from Subway and was totally ignored while standing in line but 2 others helped, one before me and one after.  My copilot claimed the manager stopped her for us to return to correct it.  W …

… After reserving a shower via mobile I attempted to purchase a reserve commercial parking spot at the counter which they were already taken via mobile which was not an issue for me. Since I was parked in one of the several open Reserve …

Clean facility great showers but the staff is really slow and I see a lot of lot lizards walking around knocking on trucks not the truck stop I would stay at at night time I'm just here for the shower though
Excellent shower facilities,  very clean and comfy, a home away from home,  a variety of goods available on site, friendly,  courteous staff, adequate parking space
Had ifta stickers mailed to me here at the pilot, they held envelope for 3 days until I arrived to get it. Staff was friendly and shower was clean.

showerReviews.reviewText: Showers were clean. Nice place to park with a tim Hortons, fazolis, and popeyes. Staff seemed friendly. Only issue was the shower had low pressure and the temperature constantly fluctuated while you were showering. It would go from freezing …

… way cool .I have spent 90 day in the parking lot.  On my travels.  The prices are everything not bad . Shower 17 bucks same everywhere better then most .. I'd like to say too the travels.  Don't F up the parking lot.  With trash the …

Stopped in to get some fuel grab a shower and do a load of laundry also ate at Fazolis pretty good for fast food italian while waiting on laundry to dry noticed how hard the girl Jennifer cleaning the showers never stopped was busy running …

Hello everyone got here to take shower and fins a parking I use rv parking or Bob tail and they have few spots here plus showers not 100% clean but 95% is pretty good  and shower water and head is pretty good compare to some places
Good selection of items but the shower was broken. Water came out cold and low pressure.
No shower cleaning person on a Monday morning....so no showers, but they enforce the overnight paid parking. …
… Guy from the Repair shop found me asking for shower and he thought I was was soliciting or some kind of stuff said something and I got a shower right away from a fellow driver. …

The store and restrooms was ok. Shower didn't have much pressure and only 3 of the 7 dryers worked. Rest were out of order. Only close by parking to store was reserved but lots of parking if you like to walk a ways to the store part.

Last time I stopped there the restaurant was still open. The shower was good. You can take your Tim Hortons,  Fazio 's and Popeyes  and stick it where the sun don't shine. I am staying with cracker barrel  and Dennys.

Shower was clean, good water pressure,hot, nice TA inside if you can make the hike theres a game room,nice store,tv room, laundry and nicely decorated place. I'm impressed for the area. Thanks TA for making a nice safe place for us!

showerReviews.reviewText: … Shower is great. They quickly clean up for next customer. I wish if there was one more loves near by so that this store can reduce the long line up for fueling. Hats off to the staff for keeping their sanity and providing great customer …
Not clean shower, need stand in line 60 min

Hardly any parking at 2pm, at 3am there was a lengthy wait for a shower, shower was full of mold, cell service (with a major carrier) is trash here, and the fuel pumps are extremely slow. Terrible Loves but not really sure what I was …
Shower was luke warm at best during the day , had 2 hour wait time.... Showers get shut down during the night. Bathroom filthy, this is a homeless shelter not a Loves...
David McleanLocal Guide · 838 reviews · 964 photos
Great but one problem. There is elephant in pipes near shower #1 .Beware
Good people working here, had to wait a little bit for a shower, but it's normal for the weekends.. But no laundry room!.. They said something has to do with the TWP approval.. Doesn't make sense.

I paid $16 Dollars for a shower after waiting 40 mins I decided to ask for a refund and the staff made it seem like that wasn’t possible but rescheduled it for me in the evening. I went back in the evening 10/9/2022 at 11:59pm because I …
Don't use shower #3. Lukewarm water. Told manager about the issue,  and she just huffed and walked away.  After that experience,  I'll be trying Pilot across the street

Corporate Love’s Executives PLEASE train your employees how to properly clean shower stalls - step by step and with pictures; how to keep shelves stocked; how to clean restrooms - again step by step and with pictures; AND PLEASE for the …

Best Loves on the road.
I love the new concept store they need to build all the new ones like this, coffee restaurant shower laundry and shop in 1 convenient place and lots of parking.  Now you are on to something Loves, keep it up.

Parking lot is a swamp in the back row... Better bring your own towel for shower..but big beer cave. And hot food most of the day.
